amendment.description: To authorize pilot projects to encourage pediatric early literacy among children of members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2451 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12506) To authorize pilot projects to encourage pediatric early literacy among children of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2451 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
